title: The King's Fall
description: The Celestial King is the heart of the kingdom.   He ensures peace and prosperity.   His time of death has come.  As the Celestial King is slowly dying, the Kingdom of Narilan is withering away. In these harsh times, people pray for a just and compassionate ruler. Yet rumors speak of a powerful and merciless warrior who is already on the way. This is his tale.
author: Patrick Rain
